entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:07 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

Visibility: 6 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with snow this evening then to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
